name: DV Minerals cables web app
description: Keep track of your cable and wire inventory with ease. Maintain a central database of available materials, including detailed specifications and stock levels. Avoid delays and shortages by proactively managing your supplies.This website is created using Html, Css, JavaScript.

name: Silon-E-Commerce web app
description: Discover a world of convenience, variety, and unbeatable deals at our Ecommerce Website. We pride ourselves on being your ultimate online shopping destination, offering a vast selection of products from top brands across diverse categories.

name: Video Streaming Application
description: Successfully integrated a Rapid API into the frontend of the application. It is a clone 'YouTube' for video streaming. Designed and implemented an intuitive and user-friendly interface for users to interact with video streaming app.

name: AR-CRUD operation application
description: This CRUD Operation Application is a software system designed to perform basic Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) operations on a dataset.
